name: Starlight Academy
description:
Starlight Academy is a fantasy roleplay site located here. The majority of the characters in this game are owned by members of the Starlight Academy community.

The music used in this game is free use content from YouTube:

8 bit Town by HeatleyBros,8 bit Ending by HeatleyBros, Fury Road by HeatleyBros, Pixelland by Kevin MacLeod, Itty Bitty 8 bit by Kevin MacLeod,Digestive Biscuit by Kubbi, Up In My Jam by Kubbi, Happy 8 bit loop by Tristen Lohengrin, Floating Also by William Rosati.

Controls are either arrow keys or WASD for movement, space bar to jump, and enter to interact. I will also make you invisible but there's no actual use for it.
